means: prevention of recurrent venous thromboembolism 复发性静脉血栓栓塞的预防

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"阻止，阻塞"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: block, bar, hinder, obstruct, prevent, hamper
means: block ： 语气强烈，指有效堵住了通道，使人或物无法通过。
bar ： 含义与block很接近，指阻塞通道或禁止出入，但有对暗示不用障碍物的阻止或禁止。
hinder ： 语气较轻，多指阻碍、拖延人或事，强调使进展速度缓慢下来。
obstruct ： 正式用词，语气强，多指以干扰或设置障碍的方式阻碍交通，使不能自由畅通。
prevent ： 含义广泛，指采取预防措施或设置障碍去阻止某人或某事。
hamper ： 侧重因受到约束或阻碍而造成的行动困难。

sentence.Network_en: A dentist may decide to extract the tooth to prevent recurrent trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 牙医可能会决定拔掉那颗牙，以免反复发作。

sentence.Network_en: The security zone was set up to prevent guerrilla infiltrations.
sentence.Network_cn: 设立了安全区以防止游击队员的渗入。

sentence.Network_en: Smear Vaseline on to your baby's skin to prevent soreness.
sentence.Network_cn: 给孩子皮肤上抹些凡士林以防止肿痛。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'act in anticipation of'): from Latin praevent- 'preceded, hindered', from the verb praevenire, from prae 'before' + venire 'come'

entry.def: To prevent something means to ensure that it does not happen.

example.ex: Further treatment  will prevent cancer from developing...
example.tran: 进一步的治疗将阻止癌症恶化。

entry.def: To prevent someone from doing something means to make it impossible for them to do it.

example.ex: He said this would prevent companies from creating new jobs...
example.tran: 他说这将使公司无法创造新的工作机会。

example.ex: Its nationals may be prevented from leaving the country...
example.tran: 其国民可能会被禁止出境。

means.word_mean: 1. keep from happening or arising; have the effect of preventing;

sentences.sentence: "My sense of tact forbids an honest answer"

means.word_mean: 2. prevent from doing something or being in a certain state;

sentences.sentence: "We must prevent the cancer from spreading"
"His snoring kept me from falling asleep"
"Keep the child from eating the marbles"

auth_sentence.content: The law is simply too weak to prevent it.

Sentence.sentence: The result of constant muscle tension and stiffness of joints, many of them are avoidable, and simple flexibility training can prevent these by making muscles stronger and keeping joints lubricated (润滑 ).

prevents many people from changing careers
The 1976 copy right act has not prevented these abuses fully, but it has clarified the legal rights of the injured parties and given them an avenue for remedy.
A shattering loss of confidence inspires behavior that overwhelms the normal self-correcting mechanisms that usually prevent a recession from becoming deep and prolonged: a depression

Scholars will debate which interventions this time - the Federal Reserve's support of a failing credit system, guarantees of bank debt, Obama's ''stimulus" plan and bank "stress test" - counted most in preventing a recurrence.

sentences.en: Vitamin C is supposed to prevent colds.
The rain prevented us from playing football.
sentences.cn: 雨使我们不能踢足球了。

sentences.en: We shall come tomorrow if nothing prevents.
sentences.cn: 如没有什么阻碍的话, 我们明天来。

sentences.en: Nobody can prevent our getting married.
sentences.cn: 谁也阻止不了我们结婚。

jushi.english: We shall come tomorrow if nothing prevents.
jushi.chinese: 如没有什么阻碍的话,我们明天来。

jushi.english: They are taking effort to prevent a new civil war.
jushi.chinese: 他们正努力制止一场新内战。

jushi.english: Sally said she would come to see me if nothing prevented her.
jushi.chinese: 萨丽说要是没有什么事情妨碍她的话,她就来看我。
